text_block_list.text:
In the morning of the summer training camp. 
It's still early, but Zephyr is nowhere to be seen.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh my, just when I felt an air of south wind…
choice_data_list: Good morning. Did you go out for a walk?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I was invited by an unfamiliar breeze 
melded with the heat of the sun. So I looked 
for a place to find cool breeze but…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I can feel the morning sea breeze blowing now. 
From… you?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It… must be a wind from a different season. 
Anyway, let's start today's training.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (From here… like a Kandatsu!)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Ha― Ha― Ha…
choice_data_list: Well done, the time is good!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. In order to become a heavenly wind, 
I must not let go of this wind―…oh.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: It's the cool breeze, again…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Um… trainer. 
Can I ask you a favor?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It's ok if you are 'calm wind' at night, 
I'd like you to come with me to wait for the wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: There is something I really want to confirm.

The wind that Yamanin Zephyr wants to wait… If I meet the 
'wind' she was talking about, I might get to know her better.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was 'Sorai'(spring wind), thank you. 
See you later tonight…
I followed Zephyr along the road near the training camp.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: The calmness of the evening breeze… is very nice at times.

Zephr seemed satisfied. However, there were no wind blowing, 
and the sky is cloudy with no stars to be seen.
choice_data_list: This feels like we're just taking a walk.
This feels like we're just taking a walk.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yah… we're 'waiting' for the wind. It takes time for the 
evening breeze to pass and the 'wind' to start blowing.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
But that's just for a little while. 
Soon, we should be able to meet the 'wind' I felt this morning.
Good morning. Did you go out for a walk?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I was invited by an unfamiliar breeze 
melded with the heat of the sun. So I looked 
for a place to find cool breeze but…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I can feel the morning sea breeze blowing now. 
From… you?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The sea breeze in the morning becomes the land breeze after 
the evening breeze passes. I'm sure if we wait here…

The wind that blew from the sea to the land this morning, 
returns to the sea at night. I guess that's why she thinks 
she will feel the same 'wind' if she wait in the same location.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I want to feel it and find out. 
How did that 'cool breeze' come about?

Looking at her being so desperate to meet this 'wind'. 
I can't help myself to pray for the wind to come soon.
(*whoosh)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear…? Fufu, it's Handkerchief-san. 
I didn't expect to see you here.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
No, it's Megane-san. If Megane-san is here, 
then this must be a place of 'sunny wind'.

From the location where Zephy was looking at― 
The voice of an owl hoots out…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
There's even Patapata-san over there. 
Fufu, everyone seems to be enjoying the waltz…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …unngh… fu…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
This is a nice forest… The 'sunny breeze' here is just like 
the one back at home. The air is… clear.
choice_data_list: It would be perfect if the wind starts blowing.
It would be perfect if the wind starts blowing.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The wind… yes… The air is still calm… 
But―

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: This feeling… compared to that 'cool breeze' is…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …Ah, I see.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It felt so strange. 
I was wondering why I could feel… the 'cool breeze' so well?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It was the same this morning. There was no pine wind. A dry 
wind was about to creep into my heart. That is until…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The wind ran away. A cool stream of air blew 
along the sea breeze… it was from you.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
That's why I thought… maybe I could meet the 'cool breeze' 
again if I'm around you. But…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
There is no wind blowing now, yet I can feel the 'wind' in 
my heart. …Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It was you all along. You are the breath. 
The pleasant breeze…

The girl who always chased after the wind of freedom, who 
preferred to be alone… is feeling comfortable being around me.
choice_data_list: …I will continue to send you good winds from now on.

text_block_list.text:
In order to respond to her feelings, I must 
do my best to make her feel the best 'wind'. 
Just when I made up my mind… suddenly―!
(Swooosh―!)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, trainer! Come! To the sound of the wind!

Following the wind, we found ourselves by the the ocean. 
The starry sky, which seems to have been cleared by 
the wind earlier, is shining the surface of the water.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: It's a triumphant wind… and one that I never felt before.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Will I be able to receive this wind someday?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: With the two of us…
choice_data_list: I believe that day will come.

text_block_list.text:
Zephyr nodded softly and looked up at the star-filled sky 
for a while. The wind blowing towards the sea was gentle.
